text: Andrew Ebbett (born January 2, 1983 in Vernon, British Columbia) is a Canadian former professional ice hockey left winger. He played in the National Hockey League (NHL). He played for the Anaheim Ducks, Chicago Blackhawks, Minnesota Wild, Phoenix Coyotes, Vancouver Canucks, and the Pittsburgh Penguins. He also played for SC Bern of the National League A (NLA) and the EHC Red Bull MÃ¼nchen of the Deutsche Eishockey Liga (DEL). He played college hockey with the University of Michigan for 4 seasons before entering the NHL. He signed a one- year contract worth $525,000 with the Vancouver Canucks on July 1, 2011. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Anaheim Ducks players Category:Binghamton Senators players Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Canada Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Chicago Wolves players Category:Ice hockey people from British Columbia Category:Iowa Stars players Category:Minnesota Wild players Category:People from Vernon, British Columbia Category:Phoenix Coyotes players Category:Pittsburgh Penguins players Category:Portland Pirates players Category:San Antonio Rampage players Category:Vancouver Canucks players Category:Wilkes-Barre/Scranton Penguins players
title: Andrew Ebbett
